name: HowLongHasItBeen
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: how long has it been
des:
How Long Has It Been? does one thing, and it does it well. When you ask Alexa how long it has been, Alexa will respond by telling you how long it has been since you last asked that very question. She will also count the amount of times you have asked this question. 

This skill does nothing else.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
